Sentencas: Composite anodes containing La0.6Sr0.4Cr3-delta (LSCr) and Ce0.9Gd0.2O2 (GDC) infiltrated with 5 or 10 wt% Ni were investigated as potential catalysts for dry reforming of methane (DRM) reaction in methane rich mixtures.
Titulo: Lanthanum chromite based composite anodes for dry reforming of methane

Sentencas: Powders were characterized and tested as catalysts for DRM reaction.
Titulo: Lanthanum chromite based composite anodes for dry reforming of methane

Sentencas: Ni-infiltrated composite anodes were used for fuel cell tests and compared to Ni-free anodes.
Titulo: Lanthanum chromite based composite anodes for dry reforming of methane

Sentencas: Electrochemical tests were performed in different gas mixtures to evaluate the anodic performance in externally reformed biogas (external reforming mode).
Titulo: Lanthanum chromite based composite anodes for dry reforming of methane

Sentencas: The design of an external layer of composite anode achieved the internal DMR reaction (internal reforming mode).
Titulo: Lanthanum chromite based composite anodes for dry reforming of methane
